bike.description: 6061 TIG-welded aluminum, sport comfort design with low-standover/upright ride position, replaceable derailleur hanger
bike.paint_description: M: Midnight Blue or Palladium Silver   F: Midnight Blue or Pearl White

components.description: RST 191-T, alloy crown, MCU/coil spring with external preload adjustor, 80mm travel
Alex DC-25 double-wall alloy rims, 36H, Formula alloy hubs with QR, 14g stainless steel spokes
Jamis Sport Comfort, 26 x 1.95", with silver stripe
Shimano Altus M310 rear, Shimano M191 31.8mm top swing/dual pull front
Forged alloy crank with 48/38/28 chainrings, 170mm, with chainguard
Comfort platform with TPE non-slip insert
Hi-rise comfort, 15D sweep x 80mm rise x 640mm wide
Jamis alloy, angle-adjustable, 90mm ext x 150mm quill (13.5–17.5") or 110mm ext x 180mm quill (18–21")
Suspension, alloy micro-adjust, 350mm x 27.2mm, with alloy QR clamp
Jamis Comfort with memory foam, synthetic suede top, burnished side panels and bumper springs
